name: apa-figure-export
description: APA-friendly PDF export (1200px width) for the experimental design & procedure flowchart.

scripts.build:pdf: mkdir -p build && npx -y @mermaid-js/mermaid-cli@10.9.1 -i figure-procedure-flowchart.mmd -o build/figure-procedure-flowchart.pdf -t neutral -w 1200 --pdfFit -b transparent
scripts.build:svg: mkdir -p build && npx -y @mermaid-js/mermaid-cli@10.9.1 -i figure-procedure-flowchart.mmd -o build/figure-procedure-flowchart.svg -t neutral -w 1200 -b transparent
